WHERE TRIP_CODE = #{tripCode}

SELECT * FROM( SELECT rownum rn, a.* FROM( SELECT t.TRIP_CODE, t.TRIP_NAME, t.TRIP_TEL, t.trip_addr, t.TRIP_LAT, t.TRIP_LON, t.TRIP_SUMM, t.trip_content, t.homepage, t.trip_region, t.img_gro_code, t.trip_date, t.cou_code, t.COU_ORDER, t.trip_unique_number, t.trip_announce, t.rest_date, t.use_time, t.trip_parking, t.trip_child, t.trip_pet, t.trip_chk_card, COUNT(g.GREAT_N_CODE) as GREAT_COUNT FROM TRIP t LEFT JOIN GREAT g ON t.TRIP_CODE = g.GREAT_N_CODE GROUP BY t.TRIP_CODE, t.TRIP_NAME, t.TRIP_TEL, t.trip_addr, t.TRIP_LAT, t.TRIP_LON, t.TRIP_SUMM, t.trip_content, t.homepage, t.trip_region, t.img_gro_code, t.trip_date, t.cou_code, t.COU_ORDER, t.trip_unique_number, t.trip_announce, t.rest_date, t.use_time, t.trip_parking, t.trip_child, t.trip_pet, t.trip_chk_card ORDER BY GREAT_COUNT DESC
) a WHERE rownum <= #{last} ) b WHERE rn >= #{first}

SELECT t.img_gro_code, COUNT(t.img_gro_code) as img, t.trip_name, t.trip_code FROM trip t JOIN GREAT g ON t.trip_code = g.GREAT_N_CODE AND great_flag='LTR' GROUP BY t.img_gro_code,t.trip_name, t.trip_addr, t.trip_code ORDER BY img DESC FETCH FIRST 5 ROWS ONLY
